Posts.Content: bonnieh wrote: My breast cancer returned this summer and after a treatment of Xeloda and now Gemstar I assumed I would beat this.  But no..my doctor tells me I probably have 2-4 years.  I am having a real hard time with this ,  I am a healthy, active 61 year old and dying is not in my game plan.  Help........Bonnieh Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: my reoccurrence bonnieh sdurantmd
